channel.title: The Australian Characterisation Commons at Scale (ACCS) on Characterisation eResearch & Data Science (CeRDS)
channel.description: Recent content in The Australian Characterisation Commons at Scale (ACCS) on Characterisation eResearch & Data Science (CeRDS)

item.title: TruDat (MyTARDIS) data store
item.description: Data management for scientific instruments TruDat is a branded deployment of MyTardis for the storage and pre-processing of instrumentation data. Located within Pawsey infrastructure allows this data convenient access to both Cloud and HPC infrastructure as well as the Characterisation Virtual Laboratory (CVL) instance it cohabits with.
